Jx.Field.ComboBox

A Combo that show a Jx.ListView items from a supplied store to select for the combo.  Supports pagination based on the class Jx.Toolbar.Pager

Example

new Jx.Field.ComboBox({
    label:'ComboBox',
    name:'ComboBox',
    displayField: 'nombre',
    valueField: 'id',
    store: store
})

Extends

Jx.Field

Author: Ing.  Axel Mendoza Pupo.
